item.title: 特朗普对印度征收关税对 iPhone 制造计划影响不大
item.description: 分析师和行业高管表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对印度商品征收 25% 的关税几乎不会减缓这个亚洲国家作为 iPhone 关键制造中心的作用，即使这意味着美国消费者将获得更昂贵的智能手机。【原文：President Donald Trump's 25% tariffs on Indian goods will do little to slow the role of the Asian country as a key hub for manufacturing iPhones, even when it means more expensive smartphones for U.S. consumers, analysts and industry executives said.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔将美国关税打击预期提高至 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal）提高了对美国关税带来的财务影响的估计，目前预计今年的核心利润将减少 1.5 亿美元，超过 2 月份预测的 1 亿美元。【原文：ArcelorMittal , has raised its estimate of the financial impact from U.S. tariffs and now expects them to reduce its core profit by $150 million this year, more than the $100 million it forecast in February.】

item.title: 央行大幅降息放缓，关税和政治成为焦点
item.description: 随着欧洲央行的宽松周期接近尾声，全球降息步伐正在放缓，美国联邦储备委员会对关税引发的通胀保持谨慎，投资者也在观望英国是否会从此加速降息。【原文：The pace of global rate cuts is slowing as the European Central Bank nears the end of its easing cycle, the U.S. Federal Reserve stays cautious about tariff-driven inflation and investors watch to see whether Britain speeds up from here.】

item.title: 英国根据新的年龄检查规则调查 34 家色情网站
item.description: 在英国新的年龄检查要求规定生效后，英国媒体监管机构周四对四家公司的合规情况展开了调查，这四家公司共运营着 34 个色情网站。【原文：Britain's media regulator on Thursday launched investigations into the compliance of four companies, which collectively run 34 pornography sites, following the country's new age-check requirement rules coming into force.】

item.title: 芯片野心和低预期动摇投资者信心，Arm 下挫
item.description: 由于芯片技术供应商计划投资于自己的芯片开发，这将影响未来的利润，Arm Holdings 的股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌了 7%，令投资者感到失望。【原文：Arm Holdings shares fell 7% in premarket trading on Thursday as the chip tech provider's plan to invest in its own chip development, which would bite into future profits, disappointed investors.】

item.title: 欧盟葡萄酒和烈酒将从 8 月 1 日起面临美国 15%的关税--欧盟官员
item.description: 欧盟官员和外交官周四表示，从8月1日起，欧洲葡萄酒和烈酒在进入美国时将面临15%的关税，直到双方谈判人员达成一项不同的协议，预计谈判将在秋季继续进行。【原文：European wine and spirits will face a 15% tariff when entering the United States from Aug 1, until negotiators from both sides agree a different deal, in talks that are expected to continue in autumn, EU officials and diplomats said on Thursday.】

item.title: 苹果调制解调器转向、关税引发增长担忧，高通股价下滑
item.description: 周四收盘前，高通公司股价下跌近 5%，原因是苹果公司即将失去其最大的调制解调器客户，影响了其乐观的季度业绩预期。【原文：Qualcomm shares fell nearly 5% before the bell on Thursday as the looming loss of Apple as its biggest modem customer outweighed its upbeat quarterly forecast.】

item.title: 大科技公司可能会为人工智能砸锅卖铁，但投资者却对此情有独钟
item.description: 大科技公司在人工智能上的投入比以往任何时候都要多，但回报也在不断增加，投资者也纷纷买账。【原文：Big Tech is spending more than ever on artificial intelligence - but the returns are rising too, and investors are buying in.】

item.title: 韩国称 "让美国造船业再次伟大 "一揽子计划是达成贸易协议的关键
item.description: 韩国财政部长顾润哲（Koo Yun-cheol）周四表示，被称为 "让美国造船业再次伟大 "的一揽子造船合作计划是美韩关税协议的关键。【原文：South Korean Finance Minister Koo Yun-cheol said on Thursday that a shipbuilding partnership package dubbed "Make America Shipbuilding Great Again" was key to the agreement on tariffs between the U.S. and South Korea.】

item.title: 特斯拉开始在旧金山提供叫车服务，但未提及自动驾驶汽车
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，该公司已在旧金山湾区推出叫车服务，但没有说明是否使用自动驾驶汽车。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Thursday the company has launched its ride-hailing service in San Francisco's Bay Area, but did not clarify whether it uses self-driving vehicles.】

item.title: 独家报道协鑫集团称中国顶级多晶硅企业计划关闭三分之一的产能，并设定欧佩克式的产量配额
item.description: 协鑫科技控股有限公司（GCL Technology Holdings）表示，作为太阳能电池板的组成部分，中国的多晶硅生产商正在商谈成立一个500亿元人民币（合70亿美元）的基金，用于收购和关闭约三分之一的产能，并对部分亏损行业进行重组。【原文：Chinese producers of polysilicon, a building block for solar panels, are in talks to create a 50 billion yuan ($7 billion) fund to acquire and shut down roughly a third of production capacity and restructure part of the loss-making sector, GCL Technology Holdings said.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 公司将签署欧盟人工智能实践准则
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司周四表示，它将签署欧盟的实践准则，该准则旨在帮助企业遵守欧盟具有里程碑意义的人工智能规则。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI on Thursday said it will sign the European Union's code of practice, which aims to help companies comply with the bloc's landmark artificial intelligence rules.】

item.title: Ceconomy 首席执行官预计欧盟将对 JD.com 的收购计划进行审查
item.description: 德国 Ceconomy 公司首席执行官凯-乌尔里希-戴斯纳（Kai-Ulrich Deissner）周四表示，Ceconomy 希望欧盟竞争管理机构审查 JD.com 的收购计划。【原文：Ceconomy expects EU competition authorities to examine JD.com's plans to take it over, said the German company's CEO, Kai-Ulrich Deissner, on Thursday.】

item.title: 业绩稳健，微软估值有望达到 4 万亿美元
item.description: 本周四，微软的市场估值将首次突破 4 万亿美元，因为投资者对其蓬勃发展的 Azure 云计算部门信心爆棚，帮助这家科技巨头成为继英伟达（Nvidia）之后第二家突破这一里程碑的公司。【原文：Microsoft is set to soar past $4 trillion in market valuation for the first time on Thursday, as a burst of investor confidence in its booming Azure cloud division helps the tech behemoth become the second company after Nvidia to surpass the milestone.】

item.title: 投资者面临全球市场重启，因为美国的负面押注崩溃了
item.description: 投资者认为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税和债务狂潮将给美元和美股带来长期痛苦的信念正在破灭，这预示着受这一观点提振的欧洲和新兴市场资产将面临痛苦。【原文：Investors' conviction that U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and debt spree would spark long-term pain for the dollar and U.S. stocks is crumbling, signaling pain ahead for assets across Europe and emerging markets that were boosted by this view.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁印度出口优势；关键行业做好应对准备
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三对印度商品征收25%的关税，同时还对从俄罗斯采购的能源和防务产品处以未具体说明的罚款--此举一旦实施，可能会削弱印度的出口竞争力并打击投资者情绪。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday slapped 25% tariffs on Indian goods, along with an unspecified penalty tied to energy and defence purchases from Russia — a move that, if enforced, could erode India's export competitiveness and weigh on investor sentiment.】

item.title: 阿克尔公司、Nscale公司和OpenAI公司计划在挪威投资10亿美元建设人工智能设施
item.description: 挪威阿克尔公司（Aker ASA）周四表示，该公司正与Nscale全球控股公司和OpenAI公司合作，在挪威北部建造一座人工智能设施，目标是在2026年底前安装10万颗英伟达™（NVIDIA®）芯片。【原文：Norway's Aker ASA said on Thursday it is partnering with Nscale Global Holdings and OpenAI to build an artificial intelligence facility in northern Norway, aiming to install 100,000 NVIDIA chips by the end of 2026.】

item.title: 全球电网扩张推动铜需求再次激增
item.description: 铜需求的增长速度超过了业界的预期，原因是全球正在投资数十亿美元来更新和扩大电网，以满足需要大量电力的数字和清洁能源革命的需求。【原文：Copper demand is rising faster than the industry anticipated, driven by billions of dollars being invested worldwide to modernise and expand power grids for the digital and clean energy revolutions that need vast amounts of electricity.】

item.title: 独家报道中国银河与中金公司计划在东南亚设立逾 10 亿美元的投资基金
item.description: 国家支持的投资银行中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp）和中国银河证券（China Galaxy Securities）计划在东南亚发起总价值超过 10 亿美元的基金，力图在美国关税战中从利润丰厚的市场中分一杯羹。【原文：State-backed investment banks China International Capital Corp and China Galaxy Securities plan to launch funds worth a total of more than $1 billion in Southeast Asia, seeking to grab a slice of a lucrative market amid a U.S. tariff war.】

item.title: BAT 上半年利润超预期，美国业务恢复增长
item.description: 英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco）周四报告称，按固定汇率计算，上半年利润增长 1.7%，超出预期，这主要得益于美国业务恢复增长以及对 Velo 尼古丁袋的需求。【原文：British American Tobacco reported a 1.7% rise in first-half profit at constant currency on Thursday, beating expectations, helped by a return to growth of its business in the United States and demand for its Velo nicotine pouches.】

item.title: 联合利华季度销售增长超出预期
item.description: 多芬香皂生产商联合利华周四公布的第二季度基本销售额增长超出市场预期，主要得益于较高的定价。【原文：Dove soap maker Unilever beat market expectations for second-quarter underlying sales growth on Thursday, driven by higher pricing.】

item.title: 微软、Meta业绩井喷后大涨
item.description: 在周三盘后发布了爆炸性的季度业绩后，人工智能重量级公司微软和 Meta Platforms 的股价在周四的欧洲交易中双双大涨。【原文：Shares in artificial intelligence heavyweights Microsoft and Meta Platforms both surged in European trading on Thursday, after blowout quarterly results after-market on Wednesday.】

item.title: LSEG 上半年利润超预期，宣布回购股票
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团周四宣布，由于金融数据服务需求强劲，上半年利润好于预期，下半年将回购多达 10 亿英镑（13.3 亿美元）的股票。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group on Thursday announced a share buyback of up to 1 billion pounds ($1.33 billion) for the second half, after reporting better-than-expected first-half profit on strong demand for its financial data services.】

item.title: 消息人士称，亚洲主要燃料出口国 7 月份对欧洲的航空燃料销量增加
item.description: 根据船运跟踪数据和行业消息来源，7 月份韩国、中国和东南亚向欧洲的航空燃油出口量可能创下多年新高，因为贸易商将该地区过剩的供应量运出，以便在欧洲价格上涨时套现。【原文：Jet fuel exports from South Korea, China and Southeast Asia to Europe likely hit a multi-year high in July as traders shipped out excess regional supply to cash in on higher European prices, according to shiptracking data and industry sources.】

item.title: 壳牌利润超预期，达 43 亿美元，回购保持稳定
item.description: 壳牌石油公司周四表示，其第二季度调整后盈利（净利润的定义）达到 42.64 亿美元，高于该公司提供的分析师调查平均值 37.4 亿美元，但低于去年同期的 63 亿美元。【原文：Shell's adjusted earnings, its definition of net profit, reached $4.264 billion in the second quarter, it said on Thursday, above the $3.74 billion average in an analyst poll provided by the company but down from $6.3 billion a year ago.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会称，由于投资激增，第二季度全球黄金需求增长 3
item.description: 世界黄金协会（World Gold Council）周四表示，2025年第二季度，全球黄金需求（包括场外交易）同比增长3%，达到1248.8公吨，投资跃升78%。【原文：Global gold demand including over-the-counter (OTC) trading rose by 3% year-on-year to 1,248.8 metric tons in the second quarter of 2025 as investment jumped 78%, the World Gold Council said on Thursday.】

item.title: 法航荷航第二季度利润增长，得益于高端产品销售
item.description: 法航荷航（Air France-KLM）周四公布第二季度营业利润增长，原因是其高端服务预订量强劲，尽管该行业对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税战的连锁反应感到担忧。【原文：Air France-KLM reported higher second-quarter operating profit on Thursday, citing strong bookings for its premium services even as the sector frets about the knock-on effects from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff war.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令印度市场动荡不安，经济增长前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对印度商品征收高于预期的关税后，印度卢比周四跌至历史新低，股指下跌，分析师警告称印度经济增长将面临持续压力。【原文：India's rupee plunged toward a record low and equity indexes declined on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump slapped steeper-than-expected tariffs on Indian goods, with analysts warning of sustained pressure on the country's growth.】

item.title: Aixtron 第二季度销售额高于市场预期
item.description: 德国芯片系统制造商 Aixtron 周四公布的季度收入好于预期，原因是对数据通信激光器的需求不断增长，尤其是对人工智能中心的需求。【原文：German chip systems manufacturer Aixtron reported a better than expected quarterly revenue on Thursday, citing increasing demand for datacom lasers particularly for AI centers.】

item.title: 数据中心推动增长，乐可兰上调 2025 年利润率展望
item.description: 法国电气和数字楼宇基础设施集团罗格朗（Legrand）周四公布的上半年核心盈利高于市场预期，并上调了年度营业利润率展望。【原文：French electrical and digital building infrastructure group Legrand on Thursday increased its annual operating margin outlook as it reported first-half core earnings above market expectations.】
